name: Chess960 Generator
description:
Chess960 Generator allows you to quickly generate board configurations for playing Chess960 (also known as Fischer Random Chess).

Features:
- Randomly generate a Chess960 board position with one tap
- View the standard position ID for each board
- Generate a board by entering one of the standard starting position IDs
- Option to show castling positions
- Option to show black pieces as flipped
- View Chess960 rules directly in the app

Note that you cannot play Chess960 using this app; it is only designed to generate the board.
